::KitKat::

"Yes there is. They are Predacons, as are we, but they defend the 
Maximals. They are traitorous to our own kind. They fight and kill 
us, and defend our mortal enemy. They have to be stopped in order to 
crush the maximals. That is why we are warring with them."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Killfest::
> 
> Killfest nods and looks over the map. The Alliance base looked very 
> well defended.
> 
> "Are you sure its wise to side with these Predacons against the 
> Alliance?" Scyther's voice sounds over the terrorrists' internal 
> communication system, "The Alliance looks like they know how to 
place 
> a well defended base."
> 
> "We will see," Killfest replies silently. He looks over the map 
again.
> 
> "Is there any particular reason you Predacons are bent on 
destroying 
> the Alliance?" he asks outloud, looking criticaly on the map.
>
